articles.author: Melissa Rudy
articles.title: Tiger mosquitoes blamed for spread of dengue fever: ‘Most invasive species’ - Fox News
articles.description: As dengue fever continues to spread throughout Europe, experts are blaming an invasive mosquito species as the culprit. Infectious disease experts share words of caution.
articles.content:
As dengue fever continues to spread throughout Europe, experts are blaming an invasive mosquito species as the culprit.
